course_description: Survey of political, economic, social, and cultural history of the West from the classical period through the reformation. Emphasis on contributions of Greco-Roman civilization, barbarian invasions and disorder of the early Middle Ages, flowering and collapse of medieval civilization, the Renaissance revival, and religious crises of the reformation.
sections: Class Nbr: 3165, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 5:30-6:45p, Instructor: D. Leinweber, Status: Open
